description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; head and shoulders of man in the foreground with smaller figures over his left and right shoulders; eyes, lips, and shirt of the man in the foreground colored in green ink
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 8) | LL of sheet, in pencil: Eigendrucke-Universtählt / E.155-163
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Man in Room (Self-Portrait), Plate 1 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
